Scenario1-D2C_ACH_Payment.TC-1: GIVEN Valid ACH Details, WHEN requesting to make Payment THEN should return HTTPSTATUS OK.
Scenario1-D2C_ACH_Payment.TC-2: Validation of EnrolleeId & RequestReferenceId Status in the response.

Scenario2-D2C_ACH_Payment_Missing_Or_Emp.TC-1: GIVEN Empty AccountNumber to ACH Details, WHEN requesting to make Payment THEN should return ACH Information Invalid.
Scenario2-D2C_ACH_Payment_Missing_Or_Emp.TC-2: Validation of ErrorCode & Payment Status in the response.

Scenario3-D2C_ACH_Payment_Missing_Or_Emp.TC-1: GIVEN Empty BankRoutingNumber to ACH Details, WHEN requesting to make Payment THEN should return ACH Information Invalid.
Scenario3-D2C_ACH_Payment_Missing_Or_Emp.TC-2: Validation of ErrorCode & Payment Status in the response.

Scenario4-D2C_ACH_Payment_Invalid_Amount.TC-1: GIVEN Invalid Amount to ACH Details, WHEN requesting to make Payment THEN should return Payment Amount Invalid.
Scenario4-D2C_ACH_Payment_Invalid_Amount.TC-2: Validation of ErrorCode & Payment Status in the response.

Scenario5-D2C_ACH_Payment_Empty_PaymentT.TC-1: GIVEN Empty PaymentType to ACH Details, WHEN requesting to make Payment THEN should return Unsupported payment type.
Scenario5-D2C_ACH_Payment_Empty_PaymentT.TC-2: Validation of ErrorCode & Payment Status in the response.
